name: Goblin Thieves
description:
Resume:

You are a little goblin in search of wealth.

Entered the king's castle and steal the 5 item.

But be careful not to get caught.

It would also be necessary to be very attentive to locate oneself.

Controls :

Z - Forward          S - BackWard

Q - Left                   D - Right

E - Interact

left arrow - previous camera

right arrow - next camera

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The game was made during a game jam, the theme was "you are the villain" that's why we incarnate a thief goblin, we had 2 diversifiers, the first one was named "Spielberg" we had to use several cameras that's why we got 19 cameras in the game and the second one was "Not really competitive friendly" to have at least 2 random mechanics, so in our game it's the location of objects and the movement of guards.
